metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9066 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In WordPress before 4.7.5, there is insufficient redirect validation in the HTTP class, leading to SSRF.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-l10n - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentynineteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentyseventeen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
wordpress-theme-twentysixteen - 4.9.5+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.5+dfsg1-1').
